main_definition: Donald is a common given name of Scottish or English origin, often used as part of the full name Donald Trump, who became known internationally through his political career and presidency.

meanings_and_examples.example: Donald Duck is a popular cartoon character.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Surname derived from Donald, meaning 'ruler of the world' in Scottish Gaelic
meanings_and_examples.example: Donald Trump served as the 45th president of the United States.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname or informal term for someone named Donald (e.g., Don)
meanings_and_examples.example: When addressing a friend, you might call them 'Don' instead of using their full name.
